title: Connect to Repository
description: Connect to your repository to start taking notes
gitRequired: Please fill in all Git fields
s3Required: Please fill in all required S3 fields
localRequired: Please enter a local repository name
patHelper: Your PAT is stored encrypted locally

patGuide.title: How to create a GitHub Personal Access Token:
patGuide.line1: 1. Go to GitHub Settings -> Developer settings
patGuide.line2: 2. Click Personal access tokens -> Fine Grained Tokens
patGuide.line7: 7. Selec the repository you wat to Use
patGuide.line9: 9. Select "Ccontent" amd make sure you gave "Read and and Write" permissions
patGuide.line11: 11. Copy and paste the token above

s3Info: The S3 bucket must have versioning enabled to support history.
localRepoNameHelper: A local folder will be created in your app data directory.
localInfo: Local repositories are stored on this device only and do not sync.
